Actions.Name: Divination
Actions.AutoHit: 1 damage and the foe is marked.
Actions.Mark: A card attaches to the target. The next time the target is damaged by an attack, the card explodes in a small blast area effect explosion centered on them for [D]+[fray]. Foes within must save or become sealed. Then, the mark clears.

Actions.Name: Dark Fate
Actions.Description: The [name] chooses a foe in range. That foe is either pacified (1-3) and shoved 1 away from them, or sealed (4-6) and shoved 1 towards them.

Actions.Name: Bend Fate
Actions.Description: The [name] chooses an ally in range, then gambles, applying the effect:

Rolls.Description: Ally deals [fray] damage to all adjacent characters.
Ally gains flying for the rest of combat.
Ally creates 3 spaces of difficult terrain in adjacent spaces.
Ally becomes unstoppable until bloodied, or until defeated if already bloodied.
